get.description: This API fetches the list of languages added for translation.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of the language added for translation. The allowed values are @yetToTranslate@ , @active@ and @inactive@

schema.description: The status of the import. The allowed values are: @yetToTranslate@, @inactive@, @active@

post.description: This API adds a language for translation.

get.description: This API fetches the import information for the translation.
This API fetches the list of exports and its information.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status of the export. The allowed values are  @failed@, @exported@, @inprogress@

schema.description: The status of the import. The allowed values are: @failed@, @exported@, @inprogress@

post.description: This API exports the translation file for a language.

put.description: This API updates the status of a translation language.

get.description: This API downloads the Exported Language File
This API fetches the translated values.

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: code for the language whose translation file is to be exported

searchString.name: searchString
searchString.description: String that is used to search the entire import and its history.

schema.description: String that is used to search the entire import and its history.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Number of translation languages details to fetch

schema.description: Number of translation languages details to fetch

from.name: from
from.description: Index starting point to fetch the information of translation languages.

schema.description: Index starting point to fetch the information of translation languages.

status.name: status
status.description: The status of the import. The allowed values are: @failed@, @completed@, @inprogress@

schema.description: The status of the import. The allowed values are: @failed@, @completed@, @inprogress@
